name: PUGG
description:
PUGG is a free-to-play game that simulates future life in a third-person perspective.

Life is the best game, PUGG is a game that simulates life in the future, in this city you can socialize in bars, exercise in the gym, buy your own house; you can own your own land and decide what this place should be What to build, the game will gradually open the market function and square function as the main thread progresses. In this online world, some events will be released from time to time, such as concerts or large-scale events.
